official_title: A bill to establish a National Zoological Foundation.

summary.text: Establishes in the Executive branch the National Zoological Foundation consisting of a National Zoological Board and a Director. Directs the Foundation to: (1) award scholarships for the training of staff members for zoos and aquariums; (2) initiate and support research to improve the welfare of animals in zoos and aquariums; (3) establish accreditation standards for zoos and aquariums; and (4) make specified project and program grants. Authorizes the Foundation to initiate and support appropriate research at academic and other nonprofit institutions. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish a National Zoological Foundation.
